Title: 14.1 Built-In Function and Operator Reference
Name: MAKETIME()
Description:
Returns a time value calculated from the
          hour,
          minute, and
          second arguments. Returns
          NULL if any of its arguments are
          NULL.

The second argument can have a
          fractional part.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT MAKETIME(12,15,30);
        -> '12:15:30'
